The user applies a red seal on the prisoner's neck, should they be granted limited movement outside prison. The user can instantly activate the seal to kill the prisoner should they disobey orders. Also, if they are a certain distance away from the user or the user is killed, the seal will automatically kill the branded. If close enough and facing it, the user can remove it with a [[Hand Seal|Seal of Confrontation]].
